title: Smart Data Models - DiscontinuousExcitationControlDynamics
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Discontinuous excitation control function block whose behaviour is described by reference to a standard model .

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be DiscontinuousExcitationControlDynamics

ExcitationSystemDynamics.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Excitation system model with which this discontinuous excitation control model is associated. Default: None

RemoteInputSignal.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Remote input signal used by this discontinuous excitation control system model. Default: None
